'''Pelipper''' ([[List of Japanese Pokémon names|Japanese]]: '''ペリッパー''' ''Pelipper'') is a dual-type {{2t|Water|Flying}} {{OBP|Pokémon|species}} introduced in [[Generation III]].

It [[Evolution|evolve]]s from {{p|Wingull}} starting at [[level]] 25.

==Biology==
Pelipper is a pelican-like Pokémon whose head and bill make up the majority of its body. It has white feathers with a short, blue crest on top of its head. There are three blue digits on each of its wide wings, and it has blue feet with three webbed digits. Each eye is made of two black semicircles with a horizontal white line between them. Its large yellow bill appears to extend along its underside. 

Inside Pelliper's bill is a throat pouch that it uses to carry eggs and small Pokémon, and is large enough to fit a small child in. Skimming across the top of waves, it scoops food from the sea and swallows it in one gulp. It can swallow up to 30 {{p|Wishiwashi}} in one go. It builds its nest on {{DL|List of Pokémon by habitat|Sea Pokémon|steep cliffs facing the sea}}. Young male Pelipper are in charge of gathering food and bringing it back to others at its nest. It can also be seen bobbing in the ocean while resting its wings. It loves to eat abandoned {{p|Luvdisc}} that are too despondent to be wary near the sea surface.

==In the anime==
[[File:Ash Pelipper.png|250px|thumb|left|Pelipper in the {{pkmn|anime}}]]
===Major appearances===
In ''[[AG010|You Said a Mouthful!]]'', a {{pkmn|Trainer}} named {{OBP|Anthony|AG010}} has a Pelipper that he used to challenge other Trainers to battle in an unofficial Gym. Anthony was exposed as a cheater because he stuffed several Poké Balls containing smaller Pokémon into the Pelipper's bill.

[[Georgio]] owns a Pelipper that he used to send a letter to {{an|Misty}} and chase [[Butch]] and [[Cassidy]] in ''[[SS011|A Date With Delcatty]]''.

In ''[[AG085|Sky High Gym Battle!]]'', [[Winona]] used a Pelipper against Ash during the Gym Battle. This Pelipper had a unique way handling its weakness to {{t|Electric}}al attacks, Winona having it strike the ground with {{m|Steel Wing}} and pass the electricity harmlessly into the ground. Despite this clever tactic, it was defeated by Pikachu who was knocked out at the same time.

A Pelipper appeared as a mail deliverer in ''[[SS019|Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Team Go-Getters Out of the Gate!]]''. It reappeared in ''[[SS020|Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Explorers of Time & Darkness]]'' and ''[[SS021|Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Explorers of Sky - Beyond Time & Darkness]]''.

A [[Poké Ride]] Pelipper appeared in ''[[SM011|Young Kiawe Had a Farm!]]''. Ash rode it to join {{an|Kiawe}} and his Ride {{p|Charizard}}.

===Minor appearances===
Pelipper debuted in ''[[EP274|Hoenn Alone!]]''.

Multiple Pelipper appeared in ''[[M07|Destiny Deoxys]]''.

A Pelipper appeared in ''[[AG080|That's Just Swellow]]'', where it was used in the [[Crossgate Town]] [[PokéRinger]]. It competed against a {{p|Wingull}}, {{p|Swablu}}, and a {{p|Yanma}}

A Pelipper appeared in ''[[AG110|The Great Eight Fate!]]'', under the ownership of [[Juan]].

A {{pkmn|Coordinator}}'s Pelipper appeared in ''[[DP078|Pruning a Passel of Pals!]]'', in which it participated in the [[Contest Battle|Battle Stage]] of the [[Wallace Cup]].

Multiple Pelipper appeared in ''[[M10|The Rise of Darkrai]]'', ''[[M11|Giratina and the Sky Warrior]]'', and ''[[M13|Zoroark: Master of Illusions]]''.

A Pelipper appeared in the Hoopa's Surprise Ring Adventures short ''{{DL|Hoopa's Surprise Ring Adventures|Flying in the Air}}''.

A Pelipper appeared in ''[[SM005|Yo, Ho, Ho! Go, Popplio!]]''.

A Pelipper appeared in ''[[SM018|A Seasoned Search!]]'', where it was among the {{type|Flying}} attracted by {{TP|Mallow|Bounsweet}}'s {{m|Sweet Scent}} during their attempts to attract a {{p|Oricorio}}.

==Game data==
===NPC appearances===
* [[Pokémon Pinball: Ruby & Sapphire]]: Pelipper perches in the Sapphire Field and will stand upright for a while if the ball hits the button in front of it. During this time, Pelipper will swallow the ball in its beak if the ball goes into the coin loop. It will then either drop the ball over the {{p|Seedot}} bumpers or, if the button was flashing, send the player to the {{p|Sealeo}} Bonus Field.
* [[Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Red Rescue Team and Blue Rescue Team]]: The post office in [[Pokémon Square]] is run by a group of Pelipper. The Pelipper can also be seen delivering the mail.
* [[Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Explorers of Time and Explorers of Darkness|Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Explorers of Time, Darkness]] and [[Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Explorers of Sky|Sky]]: A Pelipper awaits on [[Pelipper Island]] to take the player's team to a [[dungeon]] to complete a rescue mission received through [[Wonder Mail|SOS Mail]], or go on an adventure while awaiting rescue.
*{{ga|Pokémon Ranger}}: Pelipper is {{ra|Cameron}}'s partner Pokémon.

==Trivia==
* Pelipper shares its {{pkmn|category}} with {{p|Ducklett}}. They are both known as the Water Bird Pokémon.

===Origin===
Pelipper resembles a {{wp|pelican}}.

====Name origin====
Pelipper may be a combination of ''pelican'' and ''skipper'' (a rank of sailor) or ''flipper'' (referring to its webbed feet). It may also be a combination of ''pelican'' and ''propeller''.
